about_the_game:
The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”!

This Heavy-class truck brings superior off-road capabilities thanks to a modern engine and a full suite of features like differential lock and all-wheel drive capabilities. Most importantly, it comes with two unique add-ons fitted exclusively for its unique long frame: a huge 3-slot flatbed platform and a unique maintenance module that comes with a repair module and an extra fuel tank.

The Azov 67096-3N “Atom” is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.
detailed_description:
The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”!

This Heavy-class truck brings superior off-road capabilities thanks to a modern engine and a full suite of features like differential lock and all-wheel drive capabilities. Most importantly, it comes with two unique add-ons fitted exclusively for its unique long frame: a huge 3-slot flatbed platform and a unique maintenance module that comes with a repair module and an extra fuel tank.

The Azov 67096-3N “Atom” is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.

name: SnowRunner - The Atom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”! This Heavy-class truck features a modern engine, always-on differential lock and all-wheel drive capability. This DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
